resources.string: Family photo at Skagit Valley tulips

Prostate cancer researcher at the Fred Hutch; aspiring software developer. I recently learned how terrifying it is to teach your 15 year old to drive. When I\'m not in the passenger seat I enjoy running, music, and gardens. Fun fact: My parents are marine biologists who named a new species after my son Alex (Trididemnum alexi).
MyLists is the app to keep track of all of your lists. Whether its groceries, to-do, contacts, home, or work, keep track of it all in one place with MyLists.
Visit the MyList GitHub for free access to the source code:\n https://github.com/imcoleman/AD340-Mobile-Apps
